newsitem.title: SPAIN: S&P assigns Mapfre unit A+ claims paying ability.
newsitem.headline: S&P assigns Mapfre unit A+ claims paying ability.

text.p: The ratings agency Standard & Poor's said on Monday it has assigned Spain's Mapfre Re, Compania de Reaseguros SA an A+ claims paying ability.
Mapfre Re is part of the Mapfre insurance group.
S&P said the rating was based on its strong position as leader in the Spanish reinsurance market and its presence in Latin American and European markets.
Furthermore the unit benefitted as 100 percent reinsurer of Mapfre units Mapfre Mutualidad, Seguros Generales and Caucion y Credito.
S&P also highlighted a "solid balance sheet" and Mapfre Re's conservative investment policy.
